section.text: *NOTE: This section includes amendments by emergency legislation that will expire on [EXPIRATION DATE]. To view the text of this section after the expiration of all emergency and temporary legislation, click this link: Permanent Version.*
section.heading: Commission members; qualifications; terms of office; removal.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 1014 of Fiscal Year 2026 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-146, Sept. 3, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
